yuddhayata elambaimata aasanna samaye bolshewikayan sambandhayen wu polis warthawaka ena pahatha dakwena wadan trotski uputa dakwayi: “wehesa nothaka kerena aragalayak sandaha, pa්rathirodhaya ha akhanda sanwidhanaya sandaha, sudanamwa sitina wadathma udyogimath ha nirbhitha kotasa wanne lenin wata eekarashi wi sitina ema kotasaya, eki sanwidhanayanya, eki minisunya.” 16 1917 mul bhagaya wana wita, ayiwas, baranowski, walkan, nobel, niwlesnar, finiks, saha pusirew aadi kamhalwala namayan thulya wi thubune bolshewik pakshaye samajikayan ho ehi sahanubhuthikayan wu satankami kamkaruwange shakthimath balaaniwala namayanyataya. 17 1917 pebarawariye, apa danna paridi, petroga්radaye kamkaru panthiya sar thantha්raya perala damiya.

punchi kale api hamoma aasa kale ikmanata loku wela,loku minissu wela loku wada karanna.ape amma,thaththa,aachchi,siya unath kiwwe “maye putha habun okkoma kanna oone,ethakotane ikmanata loku wela loku mahaththayek wenna puluwan” kiyala.punchi dawas wala api hamogema hith wala thibune ape amma thaththa wage loku dewal karanna.thaththage loku sapaththu deka dagena,loku kamisayak adagena,tayi patiyakuth dagena bari bari gathe wati wati apith wadata yanna lasthi una.

parani waidika danumehi sadharanikaranayata wadagathkamak nowiya), swasiddhathmaka kramaya, uunithawadaya, paddhathin samasthayak lesa noganima, ee wenuwata paddhathiya yanna kotaswala ekathuwak lesa salakima, anek paththata paddhathiya kotaswalata kadima ha wen kirima, ee samaga paddhathin yanthrika lesa ganima, bahira lokayak athayi upakalpanaya kirima, bahira lokaya wasthawika yatharthayak lesa salakima, dewiyan wahanse bahira lokaya yam nithi paddhathiyakata anuwa mawa athayi salakima, ee nithi dewiyan wahansege prathibimbaya lesa mawa athi minisata wisheshayen ma sudu pirimiyata danagatha haki yayi salakima, sansiddhiwalata bahira hethu sewima (meya dewiyan wahanse bahira hethuwak wima nisa pana nagennaki), paddhathiyaka abhyantharaya da eeniya bahira kriya ha prathikriya aashrayen salakima aadiya weyi.
